mapper.select: select sum(c_price) as c_sum ,to_char(c_mcsj,'HH24:mi:ss') as c_selltime from carinfo where to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{time} group by to_char(c_mcsj,'HH24:mi:ss')

select sum(c_price) as c_sum,to_char(c_mcsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as c_selltime from carinfo where to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY-MM')=#{time} group by to_char(c_mcsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by to_char(c_mcsj,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select sum(c_price) as c_sum,to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY-mm') as c_selltime from carinfo where to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY')=#{year} group by to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY-mm') order by to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY-mm')
select sum(c_price) as c_sum,to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY') as c_selltime from carinfo where to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY')>0 group by to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY') order by to_char(c_mcsj,'YYYY')
